devdoc.author: The Moonbeam Team
devdoc.details: The interface through which solidity contracts will interact with pallet-author.mapping

addressOf(bytes32).details: Get the address of the given nimbus ID

params.nimbusId: The nimbus ID for which we want to know the address

returns._0: address The address, or zero if this nimbus ID is unknown.

keysOf(bytes32).details: Get the keys of the given nimbus ID

params.nimbusId: The nimbus ID for which we want to know the keys

returns.keys: Keys, or empty if this nimbus ID is unknown.

nimbusIdOf(address).details: Get the nimbus ID of the given addresss

params.who: The address for which we want to know the nimbus id

returns._0: id The nimbus ID, or zero if this address don't have a nimbus ID.

params.newNimbusId: The new nimbusId to be associated
params.oldNimbusId: The old nimbusId to be replaced

devdoc.title: Pallet AuthorMapping Interface
